page.title: 17My weekend
page.content: by Earl Colley On Saturday I am up for 0700.I wash, dress and switch my computer on.I call for Samantha and Tony at 0900.We spend the morning in the arcade at Stourport .In the afternoon we go up the park.If nobody is there we go over the recreation ground and play chase on bikes.I go in for my tea at 1800.I go out again and am told to be in for 2100 to babysit.I spend the night watching television or playing on my spectrum computer.I go to bed at 2400. On Sunday I often spend an extra hour in bed.My mother does not go out on Sunday's so I do not need to baby_ sit.Sometimes I spend the weekend on camp with the Army Cadet Force. On camp we do different things just like the "ARMY".When I get back I change and go out to play.
